name: AX\_Mode\_Primitive
intent: Define Mode as atomic excitation of semantic geometry.
constraints: Mode is a label for ψ-oscillation and related semantic excitation (e.g., frequency, polarization, channel).
Modes may be attached only to primitives that support\_modes \== true.
For a fixed geometry, distinct Modes form a discrete basis of excitations (no two distinct Modes are identical).
ψ dynamics over primitives is resolved as superposition of attached Modes under IGSOA wave rules.
